CURRICULUM VITAE
SHAILESH  KUMAR
Email- shailesh1995@yahoo.com
Phone: +918602037198
CAREER OBJECTIVE
To make a successful career by accepting different challenges and risks by
employing my skills and abilities, while being innovative, resourceful and
flexible.
RESPONSIBILTIES AND EXPERIENCE
Working as Estimation & Design Engineer in  Consilium SFS Fire and
Security Solutions PVT LTD.  which deals in fire fighting systems in
power plants and other industrial plants in India & Overseas.
The job profile mainly includes estimation of different packages
related  to  Balance  of  plant  Packages  such  as  Fire  Protection
Package, Water Treatment Package & Circulating Water Package
etc. after analyzing tender document and drawings.
The job profile as Estimation Engineer includes the responsibility of making
Techno  commercial  offers  which  starts  from  studying  the  technical
specifications,  getting  clarifications  from  the  client,  identifying  area  of
scope of work, making BOM/BOQ and doing Basic costings etc. This also
includes taking quotations from sub-vendors, client interaction and proper
follow up.
Have quoted more than 50 packages of Fire Detection, Protection & Alarm
System & other BOP packages.
Having about 1 years of experience in AutoCAD designing.
The job profile as Design Engineer includes the responsibility of designing
the piping layout & G.A Dwgs, designing the various fire protection systems
such as Hydrant System, Water Spray system, Sprinkler system, Foam and
Gas based fire protection system, making design Philosophies and P & IDs,
preparing  data  sheets,  preparing  bill  of  materials,  making  isometric
drawings, visiting client site to understand the requirements for technical
drawings,  keeping  the  record  of  drawings  and coordinating  with  other
departments.
Good knowledge of design codes such as TAC, OISD & NFPA.
Knowledge of Fire Water Pump selection as per NFPA 20.
Knowledge  of  Foam  Protection  system  for  storage  tanks  &  chemical
storage areas as per NFPA 11.
Knowledge of Hydrant system, Water spray system & Sprinkler System.
Knowledge of various gas flooding systems such as CO2 (NFPA 12) & IG
541(NFPA 2001).
Knowledge of Tube based (Fire De-Tec) fire protection system with CO2,
FM 200 & NOVEC. 
Good  knowledge  of  PIPENET  –  software  for  Hydrant  &  Spray  System
hydraulic calculation involved in fire protection.
Training of AutoCAD from CADD Centre, Bhopal
Have  designed  the  fire  protection  system  for  1x163  MW  gas  fired
Combined Cycle Power Plant in Fenchuganj, Bangladesh.
Have  designed  the  fire  protection  system for  (1x660  MW)  Harduaganj
Thermal power station.
Have a good knowledge in Ms-Office, Excel, Power-point and Internet and
other basic operations such as search engines, mail operation etc.
